channel.title: Repose - Looking for developers
channel.description:
[center][IMG width=430 height=226]http://i62.tinypic.com/2h4lu82.jpg[/img] [b]What is Repose?[/b] [i]"Repose started as a small little project I was working on after I quit development with another server. I have been working on this PI server for about three weeks now, and in that time most of it was spent removing content instead of adding it. After removing most of the content and such of the base server, it suddenly sparked inside of me that I should start making this server better."[/i] [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,666792.msg4458382.html]- Old thread[/url]
This server is not going to be ready to be released for quite awhile. A few months, more than likely. So if you're going to apply, do not expect to have players within days, because there is much to be done.
Current staff Me - Server & Client Developer
Currently, I am looking for 2 Server Developers. Use the following application(You may PM me if you do not want to reveal your information)[/center] [code]Name: Age: Time zone: (Ex: UTC-6:00) Skype: (This will be the main form of communication)
How available are you?
How long have you been programming Java?
How long have you been programming RSPSs?
Any examples of your previous work:
Why should you be chosen?
Anything else you want to add:[/quote]
[/code]

item.title: Repose - Looking for developers

item.description:
@Project_Territh wrote:

Name:
Age:
Time zone: (Ex: UTC-6:00)
Skype: (This will be the main form of communication)
highryan1233

How available are you?
very.

How long have you been programming Java?
4-5years
How long have you been programming RSPSs?
4-5years

Any examples of your previous work:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=667654.msg4465086#msg4465086

Why should you be chosen?

I can not only provide some aspects of programming into the server, but I also have a vps and a domain.

Anything else you want to add: I’d prefer to do a 2007 based server, I have many ideas about this and hope to hear from you soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Repose - Looking for developers
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[center]
What is Repose?
“Repose started as a small little project I was working on after I quit development with another server. I have been working on this PI server for about three weeks now, and in that time most of it was spent removing content instead of adding it. After removing most of the content and such of the base server, it suddenly sparked inside of me that I should start making this server better.”
- Old thread

This server is not going to be ready to be released for quite awhile. A few months, more than likely. So if you’re going to apply, do not expect to have players within days, because there is much to be done.

Current staff
Me - Server & Client Developer

Currently, I am looking for 2 Server Developers.
Use the following application(You may PM me if you do not want to reveal your information)[/center]

[code]Name:
Age:
Time zone: (Ex: UTC-6:00)
Skype: (This will be the main form of communication)

How available are you?

How long have you been programming Java?

How long have you been programming RSPSs?

Any examples of your previous work:

Why should you be chosen?

Anything else you want to add:[/quote]

[/code]

Read full topic
